titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a special depreciation allowance for certain property placed in service during 2008 and 2009.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S97-99, S101-105)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/22/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 30 to 50% the bonus depreciation for new business equipment placed in service in 2008 and 2009.
